Introduction à libvdpau-va-gl
Le paquet libvdpau-va-gl package contains a library which implements the VDPAU library. Libvdpau_va_gl uses OpenGL under the hood to accelerate drawing et scaling et the VA-API (if available) to accelerate video decoding. For now VA-API is available on some Intel chips, et on some AMD video adapters with the help of the libvdpau driver.

sect3.title: Installation de libvdpau-va-gl
sect3.para: Installez libvdpau-va-gl en lançant les commandes suivantes :

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$XORG_PREFIX .. && make

sect3.para: Pour tester le résultat, tapez : make check. The tests must be run from an Xorg environment.
